full_summary:
**Title:** Ethnocultural Hygiene Products
**Reference Number**: cb-563-53890678

**Solicitation Information:**

* **Publication Date:** January 12, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 26, 2024, 13:00:00 (local time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** February 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** January 31, 2025

**Procurement Details:**

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer (RSO)
* **Trade Agreements:** Not Applicable
* **Regions of Operation:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** Nova Scotia, Canada, New Brunswick

**Contracting Entity:**

* **Name:** Correctional Service Canada
* **Address:** 1045 Main St, 2nd Floor, Moncton, NB E1C1H1, Canada
* **Contact:** Jolaine Amos, (506) 269-3787, jolaine.amos@csc-scc.gc.ca

**Scope of Work:**

The Correctional Service Canada is seeking a supplier to provide ethnocultural hygiene products for offenders within their institutions. The objective is to expand the catalogue of products available through the inmate purchasing program, inmate canteen, and available for purchase by the institution.

**Deliverables:**

* Palmar’s Cocoa Butter Formula Daily Skin Therapy Heals Softens Lotion – 13.5oz
* ORS Olive Oil Creamy Aloe Shampoo 12.5oz
* ORS Olive Oil Replenishment Conditioner 12.25 oz
* Bump Patrol Cool Shave Gel 4oz
* Palmer’s Cocoa Butter Formula with Vitamin E Moisturizes Hydrate Cream Soap 3.5oz
* Cantu Men’s 3 in 1 Shampoo & Conditioner & Bodywash 400ml
* Afro Picks
* African Gold Coconut Hair Oil 340g/12oz
* Cantu Shea Butter Conditioner 400ml/13.5oz
* Cantu Shea Butter Shampoo 400ml/13.5oz

**Submission Requirements:**

Suppliers can obtain the complete statement of work by downloading the solicitation document and associated documents from the Canada buys/tender opportunities website. Documents may be submitted in either official language
